title: One month Duolingo Premium
name: Duolingo
about:
If you're looking for a fun way to learn a language and refuse to go to face-to-face classes, get a Duolingo language subscription. Studies show that sharing the language of Duolingo with small and quick lessons increases the effectiveness of these programs and has positive effects on people. This service is one of the fierce competitors of Mandli language education. 

  In the Duolingo application, people's listening, writing and speaking skills are important and they are taught in a way that they can easily communicate in their own language. 

 This subscription is provided to people with exclusive features. That is, by combining the best of artificial intelligence and language, the lessons are designed to help learners launch to pursue science at a level and pace appropriate to their circumstances. By providing game-like methods such as challenges, friendly reminders, and pairs, this service makes the language habitual and motivates people. 

 The most important thing that Duolingo has in common is that it helps people learn the destination well in fun ways.
unlimitedFeatures:
This subscription service in the form of Duolingo Plus is offered without ads and increases the speed of language learning. By purchasing a Duolingo subscription from Pomegranate Gift, you can learn the language at any time and place on Android and iOS devices and test your language knowledge by taking designed tests. It should be noted that the advanced English test of this service is very convenient and affordable.

 This subscription service is one of the best teaching aid programs in schools, which has more than 300 million users!
benefits: Regular and targeted language training
Learning based on play and fun (gamification)
The possibility of learning the language offline
smooth conversation
Teaching more than 34 living languages of the world
Conduct regular tests

title: One month Spotify Premium
name: Spotify
about: Spotify is one of the most popular music streaming services in the world. The service is available for most smart devices, including Windows, Mac, and Linux computers, as well as iOS and Android smartphones and tablets. Music can be searched through various options such as artist, album, genre and playlist. Users can create, edit and share playlists or they can share music on social media and create playlists with other users. Spotify has provided access to more than 30 million songs.
unlimitedFeatures:
Spotify is a free service that, if used for free, most of its services come with advertisements. By purchasing a Spotify subscription, in addition to removing ads, you can access VIP features such as better sound quality, downloading and playing music offline, offering playlists according to your taste, etc.


Buying a Spotify premium family account is very affordable, because the cost of a subscription will be divided between several people, and 5 other people are using this service along with you.


 By purchasing a Spotify family subscription, playlists and all user information are completely separate from other family members, and you can enjoy your favorite music with complete confidence that information and playlists will not be leaked, and you can be sure that your account information is not shared with others. It will not be and vice versa. Obviously, the family plan will be more cost-effective compared to Spotify's Individual plan.

title: One month Telegram Premium
name: Telegram Premium
about:
At the same time as the number of Telegram messenger users reached 700 million people, we saw the introduction of the subscription version of this popular messenger. Pavel Dorf, CEO of Telegram, stated that Telegram relies more on its users than advertising companies, and in order to continue this policy, it needs to earn money through its users, so it has offered Telegram Premium subscription.

Currently, users can purchase a special Telegram subscription and use its features by paying a fee. This subscription version was released by Telegram after almost ten years of activity and providing free services. Like any other subscription program, by purchasing a premium Telegram account from Enargift, you will get access to a set of special services that users do not have in the free version.

Telegram Premium is the first subscription and paid version of Telegram since its launch in 2013.

    Over the years, many features have been added to this application, and its subscription version also adds new features that users have always requested from the developers.
benefits: Remove annoying ads and better user experience
Fixing the upload limit and increasing it from 2GB to 4GB
Increasing the speed of downloading files to the maximum possible bandwidth
Ability to convert voice to text
Use customized emojis to reply to messages
Adding a label and star to your profile and username to identify your premium telegram
The possibility of changing and customizing the Telegram logo
Increased ability to join channels and groups from 500 to 1000
The feature of animated profile picture that is displayed even on the main screen of chats.
Show the moving bar of the remaining time to send the file
The ability to send a request to join the group and check it by the group admin

title: One month YouTube Premium
name: YouTube Premium
about: If you are interested in the world of video and music, you are certainly familiar with the YouTube service. It should be noted that to save money and get rid of the limitations of this service, you can buy a premium YouTube subscription.
benefits: Watching YouTube videos without annoying ads: By purchasing YouTube Premium Turkey subscription, you can have the ability to remove YouTube ads on all devices that log into the service through a Google account. Including smart TVs, game consoles, as well as YouTube mobile apps, YouTube Music and YouTube Kids are available to users without any ads.

Play in the background: YouTube Premium subscription allows you to continue watching your YouTube video while your mobile is locked. Also, if two programs are running on your mobile screen, you can still watch your favorite content on YouTube alongside them.
Access to YouTube Premium Music: This service offers its users the latest songs in the world.

Having YouTube Originals: With a YouTube Premium subscription, you can watch all the series and movies of the biggest producers on YouTube immediately after they are released and without paying any additional fees.
